subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The parents of former Atlanta Thrasher Dan Snyder are still trying to shape and build the legacy of their son, who was killed in a car crash with teammate Dany Heatley in 2003.
snippet: The parents of former Atlanta Thrasher Dan Snyder are still trying to shape and build the legacy of their son, who was killed in a car crash with teammate Dany Heatley in 2003.
